title: Sweet potato curry with paneer
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '500g sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 tbsp mild curry powder', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh root ginger', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '100ml vegetable stock', '150g shelled fresh or frozen peas', '250g paneer, cut into 1.5cm cubes', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint']
